transcript:
Customer: Hello

Hanji main ye keh rahi thi ki iska flow kab se badhega sir?

Executive: Ji mam ab dekho isme jaise ki sari mapping vagarah ho gayi hai, theek hai? To ye hai ki jo matlab pichle jo bhi mahine gaye hue hain, theek hai? Unse to better hi flow aapka aayega is mahine.

Matlab jo upcoming month hai.

Customer: To quantity ka bhi dekhe na, quantity ka bhi issue rehta hai bahut kam.

Executive: Mam quantity ka jante ho, main aapko batata hu. Quantity ka hum log ispe kuch bhi nahi kar sakte. Ye sirf buyer hai, theek hai? Wo buyer ke side se padta hai. Suppose kare kisi buyer ko agar aisa hota hai na ki log 1 lakh piece bhi likh ke bhi 10 hi piece lete hain ya fir 10 piece likh ke bhi 1 lakh lete hain. Usme mam hamara koi control nahi hai. Agar buyer 10 piece dalega to 10 piece wali inquiry hum log show karte hain. 1 lakh piece dalega to 1 lakh piece wali.

Customer: Achcha.

Executive: Haan, haan, haan, haan. Achcha ek minute aur mam. Kal humne kuch products add kiye hue the, ek minute. Red brick mein deal nahi karte na hum log?

Customer: Kis mein?

Executive: Red brick mein wo jo laal eent aati hai, usme to nahi karte?

Customer: Karte hain, karte hain. Abhi in sab ki images lagani hai. Maine dumbbell aur in sab ki lagayi thi kal zigzag vagarah ki.

Executive: Ye red brick wale ko add kar du aap laga doge?

Customer: Laga do, kar do.

Executive: Theek hai, kar diya.

Fly ash bricks, isme to karte hi hain?

Customer: Nahi, isme nahi karte.

Executive: Clay brick?

Customer: Nahi, ye sab nahi karte.

Executive: Cement brick mam?

Customer: Cement brick wahi ho jayega. Kafi sari brick ki aapne dal rakhi hai already.

Executive: Yeah. Isme bhi same hi nahi jani hai.

Wire cut brick?

Customer: Nahi, ye nahi hai.

Executive: Nahi, ye bhi nahi.

Interlock concrete blocks, isme to karte hain right?

Customer: Haan, to wo to kar rakha hai aapne shayad.

Executive: Mam main batata hu, yaha pe jo aa raha hai na, ye aise suggestions aate hain ki inse jyada lead generate hoti hai na to aise suggestion aate hain.

Heat reflective tiles mein deal karte hain mam hum log?

Customer: Nahi, nahi.

Executive: Ye hexagonal paver block mein to karte hain right?

Customer: Hexagonal nahi hota hamare paas abhi.

Executive: Achcha.

Block paving already added hai.

Okay sir, theek hai mam. Theek hai bas do hi product add kiye. Ab baki mam isko na aap isko haan mam isko aap aaj complete kar lo aur baki score vagarah sara 85 jo bhi aapne complete kiya hai 85 85 hai.

Customer: Hmm hmm.

Executive: Theek hai mam chalega mam. Aap isko kara lo, theek hai. Isko mam ye miss call wala jo mam ticket hai isko mam close kar dena, theek hai?

Customer: Haanji, haanji.

Executive: Okay mam okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Enquired about increase in flow of buyleads.

- Quantity of buyleads is very less.



Resolution:

- Executive said flow will improve this month.

- Explained quantity depends on buyer's requirements.

- Added red brick product to the catalog.

- Asked to complete the score.

- Executive will close the missed call ticket.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, quantity, product addition, score
